about_the_game:
Six years ago, a mysterious thief “Beneatha” vanished after committing several thefts. As Elaine embarked on a journey to track the thief down, she encountered a series of murders… Are all of these related?

Play the role of Elaine, an expressive and highly intuitive girl. Travel to different cities with her friends to solve a series of murders meanwhile revealing the truth behind “Beneatha”’s past thefts.

Features

Investigate a series of murders while revealing the identity of the mysterious thief

Cute and Trustable main characters

Multiple Endings base on your decisions

A Bitter and Sweet journey

Characters


“I don’t know if I can do it… But I want to give it a try!”

Age: 18　　Likes: things which are crystal clear and beautiful, picture book
An expressive and highly intuitive girl.
Although a bit clumsy, she is always strong and reliable in critical moments.


“There’s nothing more fascinating than the truth.”

Age: 19　　Likes: seeking for knowledge, candy, people who take actions
Rookie detective, a girl with a strong desire for knowledge.


“I’m glad you’re here with me!”

Age: 17　　Likes: music, ghost story, occult
A gentle and courteous girl.
She is always willing to help others and is loved by those around her.

and more...

name: BitterSweet Detectives' Tea Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8.1/10
  • Processor: i3以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics系列（1GB必須）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 相容DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: 解析度：1280*720以上（推薦1920*1080）
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8.1/10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: i5以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM1GB以上Geforce系列
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 相容DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: 解析度：1280*720以上（推薦1920*1080）

short_description: Bittersweet Detectives' Tea Party is an adventure-mystery visual novel game, tracking down the cases left by a mysterious phantom thief named “Beneatha”. It is a tale about seeking the truth, with a bitter and sweet journey.
